lines.text: "Here lie the clothes of Spanky, Mickey, Buckwheat and Froggy. Don't dig 'em up or you'll get groggy! We buried 'em well - We buried 'em deep - so let them rest in their smelly sleep!"]

[after Froggy's chemical concoction made their clothes unbearable and their school-teacher gave them the day off. The police then quickly removed Spanky, Froggy, Buckwheat and Mickey from the theatre. Them, they buried the odorous clothes and are at the edge of a forest. All four and one at a time, say four words of a two-word sentence]
[after their shared sentence, is completed, Spanky, Mickey, Buckwheat and Froggy wave farewell, to the camera, as the Closing Musical Credit begins]
